ingredients: 1   +   1/4 cups all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 1   +   1/4 teaspoons white sugar,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cup milk, 1  egg,   +   1/2 tablespoon butter, melted,   +   1/2 cup frozen blueberries, thawed
